sentences.english: Hydroxyl has an extremely oxidizing nature.
sentences.chinese: 氫氧基具有極強的氧化特性。

sentences.english: Objective To study Optimization of the react conditions of benzyloxy-benzaldehyde synthesized under microwave irradiation.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究微波合成苄氧基苯甲醛的最佳反應條件。

sentences.english: The result indicated that ethoxy methylene cyanacetic ester is sensitive agent.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，乙氧基甲叉氰乙酸乙酯是致敏原。

sentences.english: Pharmaceuticals which has methoxy can degrade to yield methanol if the headspace oven temperature is too high.
sentences.chinese: 含甲氧基的藥品在較高頂空溫度下降解產生甲醇。

sentences.english: The oxidative stability of alcohol ethoxylates during storage and handling is studied. Realistic conditions are modelled by heating in quiescent air.
sentences.chinese: 研究在脂肪醇乙氧基化物儲存和搬運時的氧化穩定性。

sentences.english: The oxidative stability of alcohol ethoxylates during storage and handling is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究在脂肪醇乙氧基化物儲存和搬運時的氧化穩定性。

sentences.english: Properties of ethoxyl and hydroxyl containing organo-silicone copolymerized with alkyd resin were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了乙氧基羥基硅樹脂與醇酸樹脂共聚物的性能。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the optimal extraction technology of low methoxyl pectin from shaddock peel.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究從柚皮中提取低甲氧基果膠的最佳工藝條件。

sentences.english: Aim To design and synthesize new methoxyl carbazole analogues as antitumor compounds.
sentences.chinese: 目的設計合成新型甲氧基咔唑類抗腫瘤化合物。

sentences.english: Rearrangement reactions of alkoxy groups are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 本文綜述了烷氧基重排反應。

sentences.english: Aim To investigate a novel rapid synthetic method ofp-methoxy styryl dyes.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究快速合成對甲氧基苯乙烯基染料的合成方法。

sentences.english: The polyol ether is a alkoxylated product of chemically treated natural material.
sentences.chinese: 該醇醚是經化學處理的天然物質的烷氧基化產物。

sentences.english: And that special something is a class of chemicals called the methoxypyrazines.
sentences.chinese: 這種東西是一類叫做甲氧基吡嗪的化學物質。

sentences.english: The relative concentration distribution and width of OH radical can be displayed from planar fluorescence images.
sentences.chinese: 由平面熒光圖可得到氫氧基相對濃度分佈和它的寬度。

sentences.english: Firstly, this paper has probed into the synthesis of allyloxy aniline compounds.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先對烯丙氧基苯胺類化合物的合成進行了探索。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the chemical constituents of Fructus Aurantii Immaturus.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究枳實中的多甲氧基黃酮類化合物。
